p: Liquorice/licorice ( Glycyrrhiza glabra) is an herbaceous perennial plant belonging to the family Fabaceae. G. glabra roots have been used to treat coughs, colds, and influenza since ancient times ( Pastorino et al., 2018), and to its ability to alleviate symptoms of throat and bronchial infections.
